title: Anxiety Topics
markdown:
# Anxiety topics
Anxiety is a normal human emotion. However, some people feel worried or anxious so often that it interferes with their day-to-day life. Here you can find a range of resources to help you understand and manage anxiety.
![yellow unaunahi on orange background](https://healthify.nz/assets/Introduction-Images/orange-landing-top-v2.png)
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Legacy/2766/contemplating-sunrise.jpg) Anxiety | Mate m훮harahara  ](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/a/anxiety "Anxiety | Mate m훮harahara")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Maori-and-Pasifika-people-/Maori-wahine-orange-hoody-canva-950x690__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.jpg) How to manage your anxiety as a young person  ](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/a/anxiety-young-people "How to manage your anxiety as a young person")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Legacy/2811/young-beautiful-woman-side-portrait-in-forest_face-half-covered-with-scarf-665x443-stocksnap.jpg) Social anxiety disorder  ](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/s/social-anxiety-disorder "Social anxiety disorder")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/NZ-outdoors/woman-in-orange-sitting-on-a-hilltop-in-New-Zealand-Canva-v2__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.jpg) Phobias  ](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/p/phobias "Phobias")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Legacy/2189/crowd-out-of-focus.jpg) Agoraphobia  ](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/a/agoraphobia "Agoraphobia")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Plants-and-animals/Poppies-watercolour-HN-950x690__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.jpg) Obsessive compulsive disorder (OCD)  ](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/o/obsessive-compulsive-disorder "Obsessive compulsive disorder \(OCD\)")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Health-A-Z/Mental-health/Counselling-session-canva-665x443.png) Post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD)  ](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/p/post-traumatic-stress-disorder-ptsd "Post-traumatic stress disorder \(PTSD\)")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Maori-and-Pasifika-people-/Maori-man-looking-out-of-window-Canva-950x690__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.png) Panic disorder  ](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/p/panic-disorder "Panic disorder")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/NZ-outdoors/Garden-bench-and-crabapple-blossom-HN-950x690__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.jpg) Cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT)  ](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/c/cognitive-behavioural-therapy "Cognitive behavioural therapy  \(CBT\)")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Legacy/16491/new-zealand-native-bush-sunlight-canva-665x443.jpg) Anxiety apps  ](https://healthify.nz/apps/a/anxiety-apps "Anxiety apps")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Healthy-Living/Families/Father-and-son-fishing-canva-950x690__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.jpg) General anxiety scale (GAD-7)  ](https://healthify.nz/tools/g/general-anxiety-scale-gad-7 "General anxiety scale \(GAD-7\)")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Maori-and-Pasifika-people-/Polynesian-man-canva-950x690__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.jpg) Anxiety support  ](https://healthify.nz/support/a/anxiety-support "Anxiety support")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/NZ-outdoors/Rock-cairn-on-beach-Abel-Tasman-National-Park-NZ-HN-950x690-1__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.jpg) Health anxiety  ](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/h/health-anxiety "Health anxiety")
